normalized: if azuma's intuition had warned her of this place, then that meant that cara was definitely up to something over here.

name: yamakawa
normalized: let us have a look around this place, shall we?

name: azuma
normalized: umm… let's see…
both, the apprehensive hunter and i, started looking into the reason as to why cara had been here.
and soon, the day turned to dark.
however, we hadn't managed to find anything even remotely close to a clue.
there was no way that the cunning queen could have committed such a naive blunder.
that had to be the case.

name: azuma
normalized: there is nothing here, is there?
the bad feeling, which i had just a while back, has gone as well.

name: yamakawa
normalized: … i guess it can't be helped then.
just what the hell… was cara doing over here?

name: yamakawa
normalized: henceforth, if you ever sense anything at all, then you have to let me know about it immediately.
be sure to not neglect cara from now on as well.

name: azuma
normalized: yes.
roger that.
and finally, it was the seventh day, since i had planted the bug inside cara.
i would be done with her training today.
the bug was finally going to bind itself to the blood lord, transforming her into my puppet in the process.
i chased after cara, who was headed for the dormitory after having finished her class.

name: yamakawa
normalized: professoor!
professor cara!
the queen turned around to face me.

name: cara
normalized: aah!
uncle.

name: yamakawa
normalized: … eh!?
numerous holes opened up all over my body.
moreover, a gaping hole had opened up through my chest as well, where my heart had once been.

name: yamakawa
normalized: … why… did you… …!?

name: cara
normalized: make sure that he stays dead this time.
just as i noticed her red serpentine eyes, which were shining ominously, dazzlingly beautiful sparks passed through my body.

name: gram
normalized: gah… …!?
i was unable to hold on to yamakawa's appearance, as i slumped over to the ground.
my head had been sliced clean off my torso.

name: gram
normalized: ridi… cu… lous…
i couldn't help but doubt my ears, after hearing the rattling sound of a whirling chainsaw.
however, immediately after that, i, who had been transformed into mere lumps of meat, was set on fire.

the last thing that was reflected in my eyes were a pair of blue serpentine eyes glaring at me, while shining ominously, along with the shimmering runes, which had been etched onto a silver-coloured blade.
it was the day after yamakawa's death.
peace had finally returned to the school.
the female student, ikehara mizuki, had been put under protection now, after having been safely secured from her confinement.
she had been used by the vampires not only as a source of blood to feed on, but as their plaything as well.
however, despite that being the case, she seemed to be holding up quite well.
she had apparently woken up during the night, before returning back.

name: ikehara mizuki
normalized: i am holding up so well because i am from a lineage of exorcists.

name: cara
normalized: … right.
that was awfully fortunate.
cara had a suspicious expression on her face for some reason, however, she turned around and started talking with kitae.

name: ikehara mizuki
normalized: fufu… thank you very much, professor cara.
the schoolgirl smiled at the queen sweetly, after she had exposed her back to her.
and then, "i"──
activated the bug.
